description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. NLL 11 features the National Lacrosse League’s ten teams, 230 players, a new game engine, new artificial intelligence, franchise mode, league statistics, manual substitutions, fighting, and much more for only 400 MSP!
description.short: NLL 11 features the National Lacrosse League’s ten teams, 230 players, a new game engine, new artificial intelligence, franchise mode, league statistics, manual substitutions, fighting, and much more for only 400 MSP!
